marklogic.body:
I'm not sure Novak can shoot on the move Off of multiple screens/curls etc. if he can we should be running them, but I think he's more of a Spot up shooter and most effective when receiving the kickout.
We truly need to sign another PG and another big, it's obvious at this point (no pun intended). Baron would have been nice if were healthy, but it doesn't seem like he's going to be rust/injury-free at any point (again, no pun intended). Now with Lin out he's not going to have time to get healthy.
Is Mike James available? Next year I would look at Andre Miller.
